accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to initialize

accounts.name: rent
accounts.desc: Rent sysvar

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to be updated

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: authority
accounts.desc: stake's current stake or withdraw authority to change away from. If stake Lockup is active, the signing lockup authority must follow if updating withdrawer

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to be delegated

accounts.name: vote
accounts.desc: Vote account to which stake will be delegated

accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: stakeConfig
accounts.desc: Stake config native program

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's stake authority

accounts.name: from
accounts.desc: The stake account to split. Must be in the Initialized or Stake state

accounts.name: to
accounts.desc: The uninitialized stake account to split to. Must be rent-exempt starting from solana 1.17.

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: from's stake authority

accounts.name: from
accounts.desc: The stake account to withdraw from

accounts.name: to
accounts.desc: Recipient account

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: stakeHistory
accounts.desc: Stake history sysvar

accounts.name: withdrawAuthority
accounts.desc: from's withdraw authority. If stake Lockup is active, the signing lockup authority must follow.

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to deactivate

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's stake authority

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to set the lockup of

accounts.name: authority
accounts.desc: stake's withdraw authority or lockup authority if lockup is active

accounts.name: to
accounts.desc: The destination stake account to merge into

accounts.name: from
accounts.desc: The stake account to merge from. Must have exact same lockup and authority as to. This account will be drained.

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: stakeHistory
accounts.desc: Stake history sysvar

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: Both from and to's stake authority

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to be updated, with the authority to be updated being an account created with Pubkey::create_with_seed()

accounts.name: authorityBase
accounts.desc: Base account of stake's authority to be updated

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar. If stake Lockup is active, the signing lockup authority must follow if updating withdrawer.

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to initialize

accounts.name: rent
accounts.desc: Rent sysvar

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's new stake authority

accounts.name: withdrawAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's new withdraw authority

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to be updated

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: authority
accounts.desc: stake's current stake or withdraw authority to change away from

accounts.name: newAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's new stake or withdraw authority to change to. If stake Lockup is active, the signing lockup authority must follow if updating withdrawer.

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to be updated

accounts.name: authorityBase
accounts.desc: Base account of stake's authority to be updated

accounts.name: clock
accounts.desc: Clock sysvar

accounts.name: newAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's new stake or withdraw authority to change to. If stake Lockup is active, the signing lockup authority must follow if updating withdrawer.

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The stake account to set the lockup of

accounts.name: authority
accounts.desc: stake's withdraw authority or lockup authority if lockup is active. If setting a new lockup authority, the signing new lockup authority must follow.

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The delinquent stake account to deactivate

accounts.name: vote
accounts.desc: stake's delinquent vote account

accounts.name: referenceVote
accounts.desc: Reference vote account that has voted at least once in the last MINIMUM_DELINQUENT_EPOCHS_FOR_DEACTIVATION epochs

accounts.name: stake
accounts.desc: The delegated stake account to be redelegated. The account must be fully activated and carry a balance greater than or equal to the minimum delegation amount plus rent exempt minimum

accounts.name: uninitializedStake
accounts.desc: Uninitialized stake account that will hold the redelegated stake

accounts.name: vote
accounts.desc: Vote account to which stake will be redelegated

accounts.name: stakeConfig
accounts.desc: Stake config native program

accounts.name: stakeAuthority
accounts.desc: stake's stake authority
